Or "black box" as it like to name in the media. In the Area of such devices is equipped with every aircraft, though a "black box" fit is not always. Tell me about yourself, Gromov, if not difficult.

I have Migrated from the Agricultural industry, raised me. Before the Area was hit was a car mechanic. Appreciate my hands in the group, so I decided here to translate. I prefer heavy and assault weapons, sniper hate in terms of upgrades.
And what bottles so close, the Duty for a healthy lifestyle?.

I can, work is tedious, and boring here - not coming back, base in the Agroprom is not already. Although I do not know were alive then, say the base was killed during ejection in 2011. Something we have departed from the topic, don't be shy, bring your toys.
Now will determine what and how, wait.
What can you say about the Cold?
what can I say, you guys think his views regarding the group is correct.
And what he has gained such 'love"?

Understand, Lebedev even though I'm not surprised, but people began to dislike. He did not ask the opinion of members of the group, when moved them to the very last hike. The mercenary has certainly helped us, but it was not worth 'powder and shot". Those who remained at the base are unable to do anything about returning after the defeat of the 'renegades' reinforcements of the rabble. The meaning of the capture of the Marshes has been reduced to zero, the victim also turns out were in vain as the road to Chernobyl, and here.
I think starts to become understandable indignation of the guys about the former leader.

Look... For the return of the remnants of the squad had to wage a protracted struggle and to return it back. We ourselves would never have managed to be Cold through the familiar 'free' stalkers took to guys from the Landfill and Cordon, helped singles and charisma of the new leader. Besides, he gave the word before all men not to leave. Any kind of help, but not the lives of our children.
you Know, whoever Lebedev, but you have ceased to be the group which was originally.
Well, that's your opinion, not devoid of meaning. No global goals we now have are not available as absolutely and unified views. So, stop with the fables, and perhaps to buy something.
hand.
a Dog you dumb or something.
It's not our, it is my Friend. Dr. dog. Old was Doctor sincerely asked Cold about the place for him.

go Ahead.

by profession I collect all sorts of history, since about pseudopath talking. On the outskirts there is a place like our Swamps, Zaton is called. I heard there is a crank on the Old Barge lives, he also has a pseudodog, fiction or not - can learn.
Okay, will check it out.
How and in what way it is better to go to 'work".

Look here: 'syndicate' in the Area has only one Central base - our. South cut trail again, the psi setting on the Amber works the crowd at times zombar rod out in the arms of the mutants. Limansk in the North busy with us, but more godforsaken place is a maze and fanatics. In the East the Army Warehouses, the area of Freedom.
[more...]

as for the hazards - assess yourself, but keep in mind that when you fulfill orders - you're at work and feelings with snot throw a fuck or put it on a shelf, no morality - only calculation. About trails through Limansk is the safest in terms of displacement. There is a closed space, the sniper's possible you can't fully shelter from the ejection, and in case of a prolonged firefight. There are also disadvantages - it is the unpredictability of the terrain, I don't know what's around the corner.
are You saying the base is Central, so there are more outposts?

I know there are three little dots. First Creek, at the edge of a vast filthy 'Northern' wetlands. The second in the middle of nowhere, on the Outskirts of Pripyat. And we have a settled group in which the supplier is behind the bridge in Limansk on the edge of the 'Red forest". You can also find our group on the whole Area during execution of various contracts.
For Liman's territory 'Monolith", as I understand it.

Hospital there is an old, but sense to climb there is a trail of the Chernobyl NPP and Plant Amber cut of psy-radiation. After you reach Limansk, hold on the road to the South, but stock up with ammo and first aid kits.
Accepted, a huge 'thank you."
Tell me about yourself.

Listen carefully. I'm the godfather, my name you already know. Not long ago I walked back here from the Creek and the guys with me pulled. Of the mutants we'd vypustili and regenerated the database. In Zaton I just punted. Pretended to be her and framed. Had to run off there.
no concepts fraerki flooded, tillage throw. Like that asshole called it, in the case of the ass it will tear.
Sasha is like, don't touch his asshole. You have a pecker too small, and the ass his iron and mazes.

you can't trust anyone except our kids, that of the skull worn on the sleeves. Around remember pidduck, some our enemies. In General, the estimate of the situation, if you feel as close to fucking beating Teki hog.
It is clear, and where more or less could easily be my ass.

Listen carefully, kid. From the North Cemetery equipment dogs our there on the old CAT road and the exits from the Military Warehouses brand held in the Cemetery that night try not to roam and generally avoid junk old. Background rattle sometimes so that the ringing of the balls is heard, plus the anomalies of the circle and 'swaroski' local not asleep. To the West of the Landfill, and there is complete anarchy and say you can not do anything specific on it, just know about the checkpoint dolgovtsev in the North. South grove is a huge, Dark ravine called the wild warriors there periodically patrol and stalkery hang out. About the Hollow I forgot to mention, on the way to it, but we have on the Farm old stalkers eyes calluses, be careful. The Groves that has a huge plus, the road and exit from it are on the Border, our will find no problems. The Cordon of ATP to keep the old try.
something soporno somehow.
what do you want small, that's life.
Yes it does actually, thanks for the tips, the godfather.
Tooth, why do you have such errands flawed?
Hey simpleton green, you what thieves the mouse bitten? Fuck motherfuckers - do not touch anyone, Borzenko cut. Touch her asshole so down and out shit builds.
Whoa, sorry - didn't want the tire to roll. Just didn't know how to start talking.
Okay, apology accepted, you understand me too I got old nerves in her pussy.
OK, but still why Tooth called?

How do you wear out my ears, I will tell so be it. Before my first trip even with the 'Scoop' of my story has its roots. Life I beautiful wanted. Speculation hunted, spalvis on the deal one went to jail. Time rewind started Dating a new to look and found Kent new stolen and traded. For three years he lived - then again, a period of time. Leaned back and 'scoop' is already there. You know what saskarne?

On the first run I got is for 'entrepreneurship", spekulant 'shovels". Now all successful for it to close. That's where the 'tail stick".
[more...]
was Released after the second release, on the bottom slipped. There is no profit, at every step the same 'entrepreneurs' like me. How did the Area decided to dump here.

a Tooth magnified the habit of the product that I drag to try to 'heart", love to complain about the quality and condition.
Thanks for the story, sorry about that.
Bro, tell them your story.
You're a fucking prison sentence, although the right and not on the hair dryer will tell.

once me and my 'Board of honor' would not disappear, he worked as a mechanical engineer at the plant and was the best spec of this profession in your company. Have rewarded me with awards and certificates.
And suddenly you want to pariganit, I'm guessing?
You now don't interrupt and pay attention on my errands.
Supposedly Transparent from the 'Prozrachnaya"?

And you're not as infamous as I thought. I loved to hang out with his chums at the plant after the change challenging. Sawaha somehow flagged our ball and dripped on me, got fired in one day as last fraera.
Life is so shit.

Flooded the fucking band life. Got a simple mechanic to the housing office, found a friend there, Vic. The money was paid 'gulkin fuck' to drink good enough. Thumped once Kent shit I don't even remember what it was about. In General, I it out with a screwdriver stabbed, well that is not dying it. Gave me a few years strogacha. Wife a bitch while I was sitting there all sold out and disappeared. Leaned back when - and drove home and everything that is left in him. Money drunk and bummed for a long time after that. As the Zone was formed, I decided to pull in here, here all are equal - all pests are the same. Went to the thieves to the Landfill, assessing me as the local mechanics were allowed to stay. The best time in my life, guns and vodka hauling boxes.
Here is not a Dump, bro.

Again, you interrupt. Came the Big Release, we hid like fryer last holes. As subsided gathered a meeting and decided to strain gyrus drunken about where the 'getaway car", the Dump was the shelter from the emissions of such. From her had to give up forever and move in small groups and different trails here in the Dark Valley.
Not sickly story.
"Hello", as I understand it technician South Checkpoint?
The way it is.
As you can apply?
No need of formality and titles, not on the parade ground. And in the event of an attack mutants or 'Nightcrawlers' which will be a long time to say. Sergey I or simply Serge.
Nice to meet you.
Likewise, it is possible to fix that spill.
I would like to ask about the situation.
Boredom here, just above the village Stalker begins... for us up to the Agroprom enemies solid.
Turns out we're locked in and can attack at any moment be subjected?

No, recently 'Fathers Commanders' drove us to the APC, which really was broke, stepped up patrols, and 'Spinner' are to cover. Plus I forgot to say how to get out from the Checkpoint going North, go strictly by the asphalt minefield on both sides of the road.
I will Consider.
You're in charge here?
The way it is - my name is Loki, Deputy Mikluho at this Station.
Interesting name - like the Scandinavian deity so called.
The way it is. Clung to me during the break through the 'Burner.' Dashing times were.
Tell?

Good. When turned off 'the Burner", my detachment marched North. Long went wild place around. Both on the horizon loomed Chernobyl, a place for the camp to look for started. Found this station abandoned and settled here. Further fever Zone start and there was 'Duty". Unfamiliar places, people few, and emissions are frequent. Signing the truce, agreed to at the Station to keep guns holstered and knives sheathed.
And where are these dolgovtsev?

No their who to shoot did not, they ran. Not so long ago we got the real Stalker one, Sasha called. Robust design has helped us a lot of good things done. But the last straw was the information of the CCP of their founder, according to which the Duty was founded by former military on compulsory basis. Their captain (the late General) simply cut off communication with the headquarters. This infuriated the local stalking, exactly as puzzled by some enemy fighters. All we had at the station was purely a balance. And then using the stalkers and soldiers have appeared, well, like straight from the air, and defectors with sympathetic was full. Here we force a 'Duty' hence banished.
where is this Stalker go away?
don't know, but last time it together with the 'company' was seen going in the direction of 'Jupiter". And not before I was, to be honest.
Tell me about the area. What fear is?

Beasts full. And frankly, we missed the 'Monolith", the bastards managed to settle in the old Depot. In General a decent base they have there. In the North in Kopachi fully zombified, near the ventilation complex and SAM 'Volkhov' them too much, keep your eyes open.
Thanks, I will consider.

in fact, my bread is information, but okay - still a bit of a lull enlighten about the progress of cases.

... Hmm. 
Smotri is a Bar. It is completely safe for the 'Friends of duty' and neutrals. 
In wild Territory, this is the former Western part of the plant 'germ.' According to rumors, the night is better not to go there. Great for postrelease point hold Measurements fall among two dangers. Down mutants, which is most advantageous to get up a hill in the warehouses themselves hills kotroliruyut snipers and gunslingers mercenaries. About the wild territory of all.
 North of the Army Warehouses. The best 'friends' of 'Duty' - 'Freedomers' to keep them. Nothing special there, except that this is the last 'Bastion' normalnomyslyaschih do people. 
For Cemetery, get equipment, stock up on antirads and shot, if you go there. Mutants there's a lot of ground and sometimes not childish. 
The Dump, complete anarchy out there, mutants, criminals, but there is the 'flea market' where you can be a good idea to trade plus, in the Hangar there was a hunter, which can be a job and of course the award. msgid same time in the neighboring territories. What else can I tell?
All basically is clear, but you talked about 'normalnomyslyaschih do' and 'Bastion".
North of the Army warehouses area 'Monolith' - Radar, horrible place, stay away from him. If you're going there, we first stock up on ammo and first aid kits.
Thanks for the info, I will consider and will recommend you to friends if they need what you do for a living.
